code: import{useContext,useState}from'react';import Brightness2Icon from'@mui/icons-material/Brightness2';import WbSunnyRoundedIcon from'@mui/icons-material/WbSunnyRounded';import MenuIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Menu';import CloseIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Close';import{ThemeContext}from'../../contexts/theme';import{projects,skills,contact}from'../../portfolio';import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[{themeName,toggleTheme}]=useContext(ThemeContext);const[showNavList,setShowNavList]=useState(false);const toggleNavList=()=>setShowNavList(!showNavList);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"center nav font-monument",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{style:{display:showNavList?'flex':null},className:"nav__list",children:[projects.length?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__list-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#projects",onClick:toggleNavList,className:"link link--nav",children:"Projects"})}):null,skills.length?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__list-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#skills",onClick:toggleNavList,className:"link link--nav",children:"Skills"})}):null,contact.email?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav__list-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:toggleNavList,className:"link link--nav",children:"Contact"})}):null]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:toggleTheme,className:"btn btn--icon nav__theme","aria-label":"toggle theme",children:themeName==='dark'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WbSunnyRoundedIcon,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Brightness2Icon,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:toggleNavList,className:"btn btn--icon nav__hamburger","aria-label":"toggle navigation",children:showNavList?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CloseIcon,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuIcon,{})})]});};export default Navbar;
